stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
http://tricky3.co.uk/products/integrated-email-newsletter-sign-up-form

There's a box that you fill in or out. When submitted it goes to a list. Your choice. I recommend 3mail (our Campaign Monitor-based solution). We can do MailChimp if you would rather. Or, anything else. Shopify has forms; you could use a spreadsheet and mail-merge it. Whatever. Your choice.
Why You Should Be Using Popups on Your Online Store.
TL;DR they will build your email list; Email lists are gold. Really, they are.
We have configurable embedded and cookie-based user-configurable modal popup modules with integrated Google Analytics Event-tracking, for both Campaign Monitor and MailChimp, that you are free to use if you know how. Otherwise we can take care of it for youâ€¦
title: Email newsletter signup form
